byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim reported from Misurata, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, James Kanter from Brussels, and J. David Goodman from New York.

abstract: International calls mount for Libya's interim leaders to provide a fuller accounting of the final moments of Col Muammar el-Qaddafi, videotaped alive in the custody of former rebels before ending up dead with what appeared to be bullet wounds to the head.
snippet: Euphoria in Libya has given way to friction and confusion over where and when to bury the former strongman.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Euphoria in Libya has given way to friction and confusion over where and when to bury the former strongman.

headline.main: U.S. and U.N. Demand Details From Libyan Leaders on How Qaddafi Died
headline.print_headline: U.S. and U.N. Demand Details From Libyan Leaders on How Qaddafi Died
headline.seo: U.S. and U.N. Ask How Qaddafi Died
